name: Crispy Whole Wheat Lavash Chips
author: debbie eckstein
summary: These chips bake up nice and crisp and pair well with any dip, hot or cold. Sprinkle with any combination of seasonings, such as kosher or sea salt and pepper, cumin, smoked paprika. The possibilities are endless and delicious! I especially like them with a delicious hummus!
ingredients: 1 sheet whole wheat or regular lavash bread
3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Using a very sharp knife or a pizza cutter, cut lavash into strips, squares, or triangles
Place lavash pieces on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until crisp, about 10 minutes
Remove from oven to cool completely; store in an airtight container
